title: ED to widen probe into Esops to Rashmi Saluja, Religare officials
description: The Enforcement Directorate is investigating employee stock options issued to Religare executive chairperson Rashmi Saluja and other officials for potential illegality. The probe focuses on Esops acquired at lower prices, allegedly resulting in unlawful gains. Saluja denies the charges, asserting compliance with company policies.
